document.full_text: muammar gaddafi's troops battled rebel fighters for control of the strategic libyan oil town of brega on sunday, as france promised to push harder for a u.n.-backed no-fly zone over the country.
document.title: gaddafi troops take oil town as france pushes no-fly zone
lines_and_colors: muammar gaddafi's troops battled rebel fighters for control of the strategic libyan oil town of brega on sunday, as france promised to push harder for a u.n.-backed no-fly zone over the country.
